comment:
* A simple interface to isolate the implementation. * We could also use some new JRE 1.4 methods in another implementation * provided we use reflection with them. *

* This interface is not a public API, * and should only be used internally within the serializer. * @xsl.usage internal

methods.name: public boolean isInEncoding(char ch)
methods.comment: * Returns true if the char is in the encoding

methods.name: public boolean isInEncoding(char high, char low)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the high/low surrogate pair forms
         * a character that is in the encoding.

methodNames: public boolean isInEncoding(char high, char low)
